attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in this government
attributes.additional_details: To change the tyrannical control that has been put on the population of the country.
attributes.background: For the people of this country to have a vote of no confidence in this current government

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Hold an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
